title: Drawing, Design for Mahogany Inlay Sideboard with Neo-Classical Motifs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Mahogany Inlay Sideboard with Neo-Classical Motifs
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner: SIDEBOARD / of Mahogany with Inlay
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard on six tapering legs (5 shown) with rounded front corners decorated with oval patera medallions, scrolls, and bellflower garlands; in flat central portion of front, two large horizontal drawers with a pair of "C"-shaped handles each, topped by two smaller drawers; low backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Mahogany Inlay Sideboard with Neo-Classical Motifs, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-25
